interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded） Review Date: 2020/09/02 Store: styleagal Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'} Review Text: This nail drill is exactly as pictured. It has an on/off switch and an intensity level setting. It comes with lots of attachments and even several sandpaper pieces to use.
I used it to remove stubborn gel polish and I've used it to prep my nails for press on nails. I like that it's small and basically the size of a highlighter. It has a little weight to it but it's easy to hold and use.
It powers through a USB cable, it doesn't come with a wall socket. Review Title: Small, easy to use, USB powered. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Straightener Flat Iron for Straightening and Curling, Milantia 3/4 Inch Straightener for Bangs and Short Hair, Dual Voltage Ionic Mini Straightening Iron with Travelling Pouch and EU Adapter Milantia {'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'Milantia', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 0.79 x 1.57 inches; 7.1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LM-161', 'Manufacturer': 'Milantia'} I straighten my hair daily. This mini straightener is perfect for camping and on the go. I actually got this to keep at the office for emergencies but I'll be taking it with me when I go camping too.
Due to the smaller size it takes a little longer to straighten my hair. This isn't ideal for every day use unless you have really short hair, but it works great in a pinch or when you are trying to pack light.
It comes with a pretty blue green travel case/bag. It has dual voltage 100-240V and an adapter for worldwide travel.
It has 1 heat setting and that's 410°. This worked fine for me because that's the temp my regular straightener is set at. Perfect for my purse, the office and camping. Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes Eyenjoy {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'} I've always struggled with gluing in lashes and I had pretty much given up. I ordered these after a friend was telling me about how great magnetic liner is. I was super impressed with how easy it is for me to put these on.
I'm kind of confused on whether the liner is sticky and magnetic or just magnetic. I didn't let it dry all the way before doing my eyebrows and my lower eyelid got stuck to my upper eyelid. I couldn't tell if that was magnet pull or glue.
Whatever the liner is, it keeps those lashes in place and they are so easy to put on. The brush is thin but the thicker the line, the better it will hold on to the lashes.
My eye lids are sort of small and I think I'm going to have to trim these a tiny bit or the ends can be a little jabby in the corner of my eye.
I haven't worn these out yet due to the pandemic but I know the liner lasts because you have to scrub hard to get it off. These should last all day. Nice selection, super easy to use. Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz WELLUTION {'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'} I've followed the directions and used this twice after shampooing with my purple shampoo. I notice a slight difference in tone but it's not that noticeable. This mask really conditioned my hair and it made my hair feel so soft. It would be great right after I bleach my hair. It also has a light pleasant scent. Very conditioning but doesn't really tone my hair Ambari Black Crowns for Women Tiara Vintage Style Crown Hair Piece Accessories for Bride, Wedding, Prom, Birthday, Engagement, Bridal Shower - Baroque Jewelry for Women, New Packaging ambari {'Product Dimensions': '4.53 x 4.53 x 2.36 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '645312483587'} Own your QUEEN status by getting this crown so you can pin it in your hair and wear it all day long so no one forgets who runs the place.
I really love this crown. It's sort of heavy and not flimsy at all. The rhinestones are obviously fake and not very clear but that won't stop me from rocking it.
The metal is sort of a coppery tarnish gold color in person. It has two little holes where you can use clips or even string to attach it to your head so it doesn't move around.
This would be cute for photo shoots, even for kids or pets. Great for photo shoots, dress up or just for fun. STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded） styleagal {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'} This nail drill is exactly as pictured. It has an on/off switch and an intensity level setting. It comes with lots of attachments and even several sandpaper pieces to use.
I used it to remove stubborn gel polish and I've used it to prep my nails for press on nails. I like that it's small and basically the size of a highlighter. It has a little weight to it but it's easy to hold and use.
It powers through a USB cable, it doesn't come with a wall socket. Small, easy to use, USB powered.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Use Case:** Frequently straightens hair for convenience and travel; exploring makeup enhancements like magnetic eyelashes for ease of use and is now interested in at-home nail care solutions. Recently expressed interest in unique accessories for special occasions.
- **Behavior Patterns:** Values practicality and versatility in multi-purpose products (e.g., travel, personal grooming) and favors user-friendly applications in beauty routines. Enjoys items that enhance personal style for events.
- **Hair Type & Needs:** Manages frizzy, color-treated hair and seeks hydration and tonal benefits to improve vibrancy while reducing brassiness.
- **Product Features:** Prefers miniaturized designs for portability and recognizes the utility of battery-powered tools alongside dual voltage features for global use. Appreciates effective conditioning properties in hair products and easy application features in beauty products, along with well-designed accessories suitable for various occasions.
- **Performance Requirements:** Focuses on high heat settings for hair tools, long-lasting makeup, and effective, user-friendly nail care tools; values products that address immediate styling needs and promote long-term health.
- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Enjoys attractive packaging and uniquely designed, functional products and accessories that add flair to overall appearance.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Rates products highly when they meet specific functional needs efficiently. Recently expressed satisfaction with a portable beauty tool that reflects a preference for high-quality items that enhance personal grooming and style.
